response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to extend an offer that reflects its true worth. Considering the unparalleled quality and significance of this product, I propose to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a mutual benefit, given its high value to you. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
